Info.Title: The World Made Straight
Info.Writer: Ron Rash (based on the novel by), Shane Danielsen (screenplay by)
Info.Actors: Noah Wyle, Jeremy Irvine, Minka Kelly, Adelaide Clemens
Info.Plot: In a rural Appalachian community haunted by the legacy of a Civil War massacre, a rebellious young man struggles to escape the violence that would bind him to the past.
